text:
Faversham is a market town in Swale, Kent, England. Nearly 20,000 people live in Faversham. Its postcode is ME13.
Climate.
Faversham holds the record for the highest temperature ever recorded in the UK, 38.5 °C (101.3 °F) on 10 August 2003. On 26 July 2018, Faversham recorded its highest July temperature on record, 35.3 °C (95.5 °F). The lowest temperature ever recorded in Faversham was -17.8 °C (0.0 °F) in January 1985.
